meanings.sent1: She always preshrinks the fabric before sewing to avoid any surprises.
meanings.sent2: It is important to preshrink the wool before knitting a sweater.
meanings.sent3: The fabric rebelled and preshrank itself before she could even start sewing!
meanings.sent4: The anticipation of the upcoming event preshrinks time, making it seem to pass faster.
meanings.sent5: The magician's spell seemed to preshrink the giant balloon before it popped.

meanings.sent1: The material preshrinks easily when exposed to heat.
meanings.sent2: The shirt preshrinks in the dryer before it is ironed.
meanings.sent3: The cookie dough preshrinks as it bakes in the oven, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His excitement preshrinks as he waits for the results of the test.
meanings.sent5: The balloon preshrinks as air is slowly released, creating a funny sound.

meanings.definition: the act of shrinking something before further processing
meanings.sent1: Preshrinks can save a lot of time in the production process.
meanings.sent2: The preshrinks of the fabric are done in a separate room.
meanings.sent3: The preshrinks of the movie made it shorter but more intense.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter preshrinks the tension in the room, making everyone relax.
meanings.sent5: The preshrinks of the building made it look like a miniature version of itself.
